messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Digest Number 4684
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/25/2004 1:30:33 PM Eastern Daylight Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: I recommend signing up with an umbrella school for
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/25/2004 1:30:33 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
I recommend signing up with an umbrella school for the reduction in stress
levels!:) AEI (Alternative Education Institute) is a great one, and only $15 per
year, per child...less than an eval.
If you sign up now, you simply inform the district you have terminated your
Homeschool program and you're done. They'll try to pressure you to do an eval.
for the year, but you don't legally have to....your kids simply won't be put
in the next grade level. Whoopee.
Great Ren thats what I wanted to hear. I'm going to sign up this week then.
Thanks very much. Stepheny


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
